title: Yohane of the Parhelion - Unpolarized Reflexion
description: The story of the girl everyone knows, but no one knows the story of. The daily life of Yohane, who runs a fortune teller's shop in a town by the sea, is relaxed, heartwarming, sometimes full of black magic? A short comic depicting the days of a phantom, far and near.
author: Kimino Sakurako, Hajime Yatate
